mapper.update: INSERT INTO WTM_TIME_CD_MGR (TENANT_ID, ENTER_CD, TIME_CD, TIME_NM, SYMD, EYMD, WORK_SHM, WORK_EHM, HOL_YN, LATE_CHK_YN, LEAVE_CHK_YN, ABSENCE_CHK_YN, NOTE, UPDATE_ID) VALUES (#{tenantId}, #{enterCd} , #{timeCd} , #{timeNm} , #{symd} , #{eymd} , #{workShm} , #{workEhm} , #{holYn} , #{lateChkYn} , #{leaveChkYn} , #{absenceChkYn} , #{note} , #{userId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TIME_NM = VALUES(TIME_NM), EYMD = VALUES(EYMD), WORK_SHM = VALUES(WORK_SHM), WORK_EHM = VALUES(WORK_EHM), HOL_YN = VALUES(HOL_YN), LATE_CHK_YN = VALUES(LATE_CHK_YN), LEAVE_CHK_YN = VALUES(LEAVE_CHK_YN), ABSENCE_CHK_YN = VALUES(ABSENCE_CHK_YN), NOTE = VALUES(NOTE), UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), UPDATE_ID = VALUES(UPDATE_ID)
